directions: Mix soup, vegetables and chicken in 9-inch pie plate.
Mix milk, egg and baking mix. Pour over chicken mixture. Bake 30 minutes or until golden.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup (regular, 98% Fat Free, or 25% Less Sodium)*
1 (10 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
1 cup cubed cooked chicken or turkey
title: Campbell's Kitchen Easy Chicken Pot Pie
